text: The voiceless bilabial fricative is a type of consonantal sound, used in some spoken languages. The symbol in the International Phonetic Alphabet that represents this sound is . ==Features== Features of the voiceless bilabial fricative: ==Occurrence== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan=2| Language !!
